imgDesc.text: A weapon that mostly appears near sunken ships. When a character appears within its line of sight and attack range, it will <color=#ffe14b>lock on and attack</color> .

In most circumstances, you can follow the energy flow to find the missing crystal <color=#ffe14b>"receiver nodes"</color> for the autocannons. After <color=#ffe14b>inserting</color> the nodes into the ship's cannons, and by continually <color=#ffe14b>releasing Xenochromatic Ball Octopus energy</color> at them, the ship's autocannon <color=#ffe14b>control permissions</color> can be overridden. It will then cease attacking characters and can be manually controlled.
